title: Could not find the python interface for SpatialDepthwiseConvolution
body_html:
Hi, I need to implement a convolution layer with cuda in a sliding window fashion (rather than using im2col and apply matrix multiplication.) I read the code in pytorch sources here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THCUNN/SpatialDepthwiseConvolution.cu. However I did not find its interface that I can invoke in python. I have also looked for it in the legacy interface, it was not there either. Where did it go?

Thanks in advance.
